actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 857 of title 10, United States Code, to require that pretrial confinement of members of the Armed Forces be deducted from the term of any sentence to confinement adjudged by a court-martial.

summary.text: Requires that pretrial confinement of members of the armed forces be deducted from the term of any sentence to confinement adjudged by a court-martial. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 857)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 857 of title 10, United States Code, to require that pretrial confinement of members of the Armed Forces be deducted from the term of any sentence to confinement adjudged by a court-martial.
